pathAssistantSteps.info:
• Respectfully end the process if the customer is uninterested or unresponsive.
  • Record the reason for closure to improve future engagement efforts.

• Celebrate the successful outcome and thank the customer for their engagement.
  • Record all details to ensure proper follow-up on referrals, upsells, or reviews.

• Clearly outline the next steps for referrals, upsells, or partner discussions.
  • Address any customer questions or hesitations promptly.
  • Ensure all necessary information (e.g., referral names, upsell preferences) is captured.
  • Keep the customer engaged with regular updates as needed.

• Follow up with the customer to finalize any pending actions (e.g., receiving referral contact details).
  • Offer help to make the process easy and quick for the customer.
  • Confirm when all actions are complete and thank the customer for the time and support.

• Build rapport by referencing their positive experience with your service.
  • Listen carefully to their needs or objections.
  • Keep detailed notes on call and customer responses for future reference.

• Confirm the customer has completed their legal service and is satisfied.
  • Check if the customer is open to a follow-up call for feedback, referrals, or additional services.
  • Log any relevant notes to prepare for the next steps.
